step.name: README
step.action: tsenv.exe "README=This task sequence demonstates using the SMSTSPreserveContent variable. When this variable is set the content consumed by the task sequence is preserved in CCMCache after the task sequence completes. See https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/mem/configmgr/osd/understand/task-sequence-variables for more information" /hiddenflag:False

defaultVarList.variable: This task sequence demonstates using the SMSTSPreserveContent variable. When this variable is set the content consumed by the task sequence is preserved in CCMCache after the task sequence completes. See https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/mem/configmgr/osd/understand/task-sequence-variables for more information

step.name: Set SMSTSPreserveContent=True
step.description: Keep content in the Configuration Manager client cache after the task sequence is complete. Used with Peer Cache scenarios
